description: Zed Business Layer - Facade: The Spryker\Zed\Router\Business\RouterFacade::getRouter() is using an invalid return type "\Spryker\Zed\Router\Business\Router\ChainRouter" which violates the rule "Every Facade should only return native types or transfer objects."
